entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException in System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive #109167
  • Upgrading Blazor to new AspNetCore requires aggressive project bin/obj folders deletion #109166
  • Microsoft.Bcl.TimeProvider 8.0.1 contains incorrect linker substitution resources #109163
  • How to Cross Compile Linux-arm64 Native Shared Libraries on Ubuntu x64 Platform #109162
  • Tag 9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 is missing the `v` prefix #109158
  • Stack overflow from ILLink when LogWarning called #109157
    10.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName with ForceUTF8Encoding causes Country encoded as UTF8String on .NET 8 Linux #109156
  • [NativeAOT] LibraryImport resolves to own exported functions with the same name, even if a custom module name is specified #109150
  • Strange behavior of System.ComponentModel.Int128Converter #109148
  • Support compiling Android on Windows #109142
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Normally only one use of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is allowed #109141

Closed

  • Regression: 'dotnet msbuild' publish fails with 'PublishAot' unless 'SelfContained' is also set #109154
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTaskPerfTest + 3 related #108291
  • Directory.Exists() returning correctly for paths involving "i" characters on Turkish locale machine #109160
  • Publishing Blazor with AOT:true hangs then fails on generic partial-scoped class references #109128
  • Deserializing a record instance, causing child elements to be duplicated when using configuration binder Get<T> method #109139
  • Android App .Net 8-Consume WCF with large data time out #109068
  • Workstation GC Performance #90555
    Future
  • Missing activity due to invalid nibble encoding in ActivityTracker.AddIdToGuid for some 12 bits values in EventPipe ActivityID generation #109078
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint for more digest algorithms #104643
    10.0.0
  • Add correct instruction execution characteristics for AVX-VNNI instrinsics #52121
    Future
  • Proposal: Support delegate signature equivalence #4331
  • GCStress=C not implemented for OS X #6135
  • Windows SDK tools do not support working with heavy portable symbols files. #108833
  • Cannot export RSAParameters from X509Certificate2 in .NET 9 RC2 #109059
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ForceUTF8Encoding to only apply to certain AttributeTypes #109159
    area-System.Security
  • Bump Android devcontainer from Jammy to Noble #109153
    area-Meta, os-android
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove dotnet9 nuget feeds #109149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix stress-http pipeline #109140
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Synthesize assembly names by default for ilproj-based tests #108997
    test-enhancement, area-ILTools-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Update AVX-VNNI instruction perf characteristics #109038
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • [ActivityInfo] Avoid writing extra byte by updating length #109132
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint #109130
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #108145
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] Permit unencrypted key exports from CNG #109134
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Use the SDK support for packaging up PGO data in a way that can be consumed in other projects #109169
    area-Infrastructure, PGO, 10.0.0
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [cdac] Implement `ISOSDacInterface::GetModule` and `IXCLRDataModule::GetFileName` #109133
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Introduce transient code mechanism for SPCL. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [mono][interp] testing #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    area-System.Net
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Sync with PR#107282: Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks. #109102
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
